home.name: Hi, I’m Igor_
home.about: Over 4 years of experience in the tech industry. I specialize in building innovative web and mobile applications using technologies such as React, React Native, and Node.js.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.subtitle: I’m a passionate software developer looking for my first international oppotunity
aboutMe.description: I am currently seeking opportunities to bring my skills and enthusiasm to a tech company in the United States or Europe, and I am excited about the possibility of relocating to take on new challenges.
